SELECT TEACHERACCOUNT.TEACHER_ID, TEACHERACCOUNT.TEACHER_PWD, TEACHERACCOUNT.TEACHER_NAME, TEACHERACCOUNT.TEACHER_IMG, TEACHERACCOUNT.EMAIL, TEACHERACCOUNT.PHONENUM, TEACHERACCOUNT.USER_TYPE, TEACHERACCOUNT.BELONG, TEACHERACCOUNT.CAREER, TEACHERACCOUNT.WEBSITE, TEACHERACCOUNT.TEACHER_DESC, TEACHERACCOUNT.REGISTER_DATE FROM TEACHERACCOUNT WHERE TEACHERACCOUNT.TEACHER_ID = #{param1}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEACHERACCOUNT (TEACHER_ID, TEACHER_PWD, TEACHER_NAME, EMAIL, PHONENUM, USER_TYPE) VALUES (#{teacher_id}, #{teacher_pwd}, #{teacher_name}, #{email}, #{phonenum}, #{user_type})
